metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6596 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: partclone.chkimg in partclone 0.2.89 is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of the partclone image header. An attacker may be able to launch a 'Denial of Service attack' in the context of the user running the affected application.

criterions.comment: partclone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
